slides.title: We Built This For You

content.headline: We Built This For {{business_name}}
content.subhead: Your listing is ready. Take a look.

slides.narration: Hey {{first_name}}, we did something for {{business_name}}. We went ahead and created your business listing. It's ready to go live—you just need to claim it. Take a look at what we built.

slides.title: Your Listing Preview

content.headline: Here's How You'll Appear
content.note: We created this from public information. You can edit everything.

slides.narration: This is how your business will appear in our directory. We pulled this together from public information—your name, category, location. You can edit any of it once you claim it. Add photos, update your description, make it yours.

slides.title: What Happens When You Claim
slides.narration: When you claim this listing, four things happen. One: you appear in our local directory searches—real people looking for businesses like yours. Two: AI assistants start learning you exist and can recommend you. Three: you get connected to our news, events, and community platforms. Four: you get insights on who's viewing and engaging with your business.

slides.title: Join Local Businesses

testimonial.quote: Claimed my listing in 5 minutes. Got my first inquiry that week.
testimonial.author: Local Business Owner

slides.narration: You're not the first. {{local_business_count}} businesses in {{city}} have already claimed their listings. On average, listings get {{avg_monthly_views}} views per month. And business owners tell us they get inquiries within the first week. One owner said: 'Claimed my listing in five minutes. Got my first inquiry that week.'

slides.title: Claiming Takes 5 Minutes

content.headline: 5 Minutes. That's It.
content.note: No credit card. No commitment. Edit anytime.

slides.narration: Claiming takes five minutes. Step one: verify you're the owner—just confirm your email or phone. Step two: review the information we pulled together. Step three: add a photo if you want—optional but recommended. Step four: hit publish. That's it. No credit card required. No commitment. You can edit anytime.
